issue.title: [CF 533] Anti-spam system.
issue.body:
Hello, I am French, sorry for my bad English.
Please add an anti-spam system for not spaming a channel when the event is a text and allow the possibility to select the time betwen trigger, like a cooldown. For exemple : This event trigger only every 10 second. I hope you understand, thank you for your great work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Leblanco | Imported from CurseForge issue #533 | Raw

comments.body:
Could you give an example of an icon where this would be a useful feature?

The reason I ask is that if you have, for example, an icon that alerts your raid whenever some 5 second cooldown is ready, you probably just shouldn't have the icon announcing anything in the first place.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
